1. noch nicht das 21. Lebensjahr vollend: 1. hasn't reached 21 years of age, is not gainfully employed and is registered as a job-seeker at an Employment Agency in Germany, or
2. noch nicht das 25. Lebensjahr vollend: 2. hasn't reached the age of 25 and
3. wegen k\u00f6rperlicher, geistiger od: 3. due to physical, mental or psycological handicap incapable of supporting him/herself; a prerequisite is that the handicap has occured under the age of 25 (without age limit).
Au\u00dferdem teile ich Folgendes mit:: Furthermore I am stating the following:
Beachten Sie bitte die Hinweise zum Ausf: Please note the information about filling in the form and the required documents.
Ein Kind ist erwerbst\u00e4tig, wenn es: A child is gainfully employed, if it pursues an occupation aimed at generating income, that requires its personal manpover. Consequently the term "gainful employment" can be fulfilled by a dependent activity, agricultural and forestry activities, and business and self-employed activities. In comparison, the management of one's own assets is not gainful employment.
Hat das Kind eigene Kinder?: Does your child have own children?
Hinweis nach dem Bundesdatenschutzgesetz: Information according to the German Data Protection Act: The Data is collected, processed and used due to and for the purpose of §§ 31, 62 to 78 Einkommenssteuergesetz (Income Tax Act) and legal regulation and the Bundeskindergeldgesetz (Federal Child Benefit Act) and the Sozialgesetzbuch (Code of Social Law).
Kindergeld wird f\u00fcr alle Kinder bis: Child benefit will be paid for all children under 18. The allowance of a child over 18 is possible, if
Name: Surname
Name und Vorname des/der Kindergeldberec: Surname and first name of the person entitled to child allowance
Steuer-ID des Kindes: Tax identification number of the child
Steuer-ID des/der Kindergeldberechtigten: Tax identification number of the person entitled to child benefit
Telefonische R\u00fcckfrage tags\u00fcbe: Telephone number during the day in case of query:
Wir versichern, dass alle Angaben wahrhe: We hereby declare that all the information was provided truthfully. The required documents are attached. We are aware that any change concerning the given information has to be reported to the responsible Family Benefits Office.
